seo.description: LukeZ, a full-stack developer from Germany, specializes in creating user-friendly applications using SvelteKit and Node.js. Explore my projects and learn more about my work.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a {age}-year-old full-stack developer from Germany. I learned programming at school and started developing my first project in early 2023. Since then, I have mostly taught myself what I know. I started an apprenticeship as an IT specialist for application development in August 2025. Since 2023, I have discovered that I have a penchant for developing helpful tools (see SupportMail and Ticketon below) rather than the next React + Next.js AI web app. I love working with SvelteKit for web applications and Node.js/Bun for backend apps (Discord bots).
about.aboutAi: I believe that AI is a helpful and important tool. However, it cannot completely replace a software engineer. As long as you understand the output of AI, recognize the errors it contains, and think critically, it is perfectly fine to use AI.

project-ticketon.title: Ticketon
project-ticketon.description: A modern, advanced ticketing bot for Discord. Made in just about 120 hours of work, it features a web dashboard built with SvelteKit and the bot itself built with Discord.js. Everything running in a Docker network. The documentation is made with Astro Starlight and running on Cloudflare Pages. Love it!

project-burningdezibelz.title: Burning Dezibelz
project-burningdezibelz.description: The website for the Burning Dezibelz band (which I am a member of). Built with SvelteKit and Supabase, it showcases the band, concerts and has a gallery for our images. It has a dashboard for managing concerts, venues, images and more. In December 2025, the login was completely revamped to not use only Google OAuth, but also email/password and magic links.

project-supportmail.title: SupportMail
project-supportmail.description: A modern Discord Modmail bot, including the bot itself (built with Node.js and Typescript) and surrounding services such as a website built with SvelteKit. A dashboard is currently in development.

project-ismycodeworking.title: IsMyCodeWorking.Today
project-ismycodeworking.description: Get an answer to the eternal developer question. Over-engineered (but a fun and challenging project),  deployed with Clouflare Workers and uses Durable Objects for storage.

project-portfolio.title: Portfolio
project-portfolio.description: This minimalistic portfolio website, built with SvelteKit and SCSS, showcases my projects and skills. It serves as a platform to share my work and connect with others in the developer community.

project-upvote-engine.title: Upvote Engine
project-upvote-engine.description: A performant Discord vote handler built on a FaaS architecture using Cloudflare Workers, Queues and D1.

project-lukez-monitor.title: LukeZ Monitor
project-lukez-monitor.description: A Cloudflare Worker that monitors the status of my various projects and services. It checks for uptime and notifies me via Telegram if any issues arise. As of December 2025, this only works to a limited extent.

project-djs-command-helper.title: DJS Command Helper
project-djs-command-helper.description: An npm package that provides a simple way to manage application commands with Discord.js.

project-timestring-py.title: TimestringPy
project-timestring-py.description: A Python port of the NPM Timestring package. It allows you to parse human-readable time strings into seconds or a specified return unit. Also allows more configuration options than the original package.

project-linguadeep.title: LinguaDeep
project-linguadeep.description: A Discord Bot, using BYOK DeepL for translations. Originally built with discod-hono, migrated to honocord (pure discord-interactions, no gateway connection) in February 2026, running on Cloudflare Workers. Database is D1 and the stored API keys are de-/encrypted manually using the Web Crypto API before storing them in the database. Why? Because there are no good free translation bots.

project-github-webhook.title: GitHub Webhook
project-github-webhook.description: A simple and lightweight GitHub webhook handler for Discord, built with Hono and Cloudflare Workers.

project-crossban.title: Crossban
project-crossban.description: A system to synchronize bans across multiple Discord servers, ensuring a safer environment for your communities.

project-jarvis2.title: Jarvis 2
project-jarvis2.description: In development: Personal management bot for a server I administrate - main feature is a trading system for Arc Raiders.

project-fido-scanner.title: Fido Scanner
project-fido-scanner.description: An Android app to scan FIDO URI QR codes for cross-device passkey authentication. Built with Kotlin. My phone didn't support this feature natively, so I built it myself. It works pretty well and is open source, but I don't have plans to maintain it long-term.

project-topgg-api-types.title: Top.gg API Types
project-topgg-api-types.description: Comprehensive TypeScript type definitions for the Top.gg API, making it easier to build integrations.

project-honocord.title: Honocord
project-honocord.description: A library for developing Discord HTTP interactions bots, using the Hono web framework, optimized for Cloudflare Workers.

project-components-v2-for-llms.title: Components V2 for LLMs
project-components-v2-for-llms.description: One big ass txt file for LLMs to understand the new Components V2.

project-twitter-x-discord-forwarder.title: Twitter/X to Discord Forwarder
project-twitter-x-discord-forwarder.description: Automatically forward tweets from an account to a Discord channel using webhooks.

findMe.title: Find Me
findMe.description: Find me on various platforms below. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or just want to chat!
